title: You should add seals
body: Add seals of honor for the boards. Sometimes giving help can feel boring and sometimes feels wasted on people. Some people are generally pretty helpful and get no reward for the service they've provided. People should be rewarded with stuff. Wouldn't want the boards to dry up with just trolls lurking.

replies.body:
Knowing you helped is reward enough for those that truly want to make a difference :3 Giving rewards for it could result in masses of people interfering with each other trying to get it, and distributing false information in the process.

But that's just my opinion. A ribbon/seal would be nice for those that truly deserve it :P
True. But I think a harmless seal could help.

>Wouldn't want the boards to dry up with just trolls lurking.

This happened back at the start of boards because rito didn't do anything with it and the forum's people half the population ditched the reddit rip off.
